short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save recipes from hundreds of recipe sites right to your Saverd recipe box.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With the Saverd Recipe Clipper you can save recipes from the internet to your own personal recipe box on Saverd where you can organize them, and share them with family and friends for free. No credit card or address information needed.

What is Saverd?
Sometimes you just want the recipe. Saverd is a free, no-nonsense, online recipe organizer built for people who cook.

- Accessible everywhere
- Save and enter recipes from anywhere
- Organize and share with ease

What does the Recipe Clipper do?
Saverd users can use the recipe clipper to save recipes from hundreds of recipe sites with a click of a button.

At Saverd:
+ Your data is private
+ Your recipes are safe
+ All your recipes are in one place
+ Your recipes are backed up daily
+ Sharing, organizing and searching is easy

Have family and friends sign up to make sharing even easier.

For more information see: https://www.saverd.com
Need help? Contact us at: https://saverd.zohodesk.com
